Text: Is there a way to install just the language pack without having to reinstall the software?

Of course. Simply download the desired language pack. System (starting with Vista and Office 2007) are free of language resources.

For example this or this

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6051258/Russian_MUI_for_Office_2010


http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6051256/Spanish_MUI_for_Office_2010
If you are interested in this upload. Cut portuguese language pack. No, it will not work. need portuguese language pack.
